alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 16 at 1:51AM MST until November 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Superior, Mazatzal Mountains and Pinal/Superstition Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior
